question: With reference to human sperm, match the List - I with List - II.
1. Head -> s. Contains haploid nucleus
2. Acrosome -> p. Filled with enzyme
3. Middle piece -> q. Contains mitochondria
4. Tail -> r. Sperm motility
explanation: Head contains the nucleus (s). Acrosome contains enzymes (p). Middle piece contains mitochondria (q). Tail provides motility (r).
